language.entry: The Tactician has a distaste for close combat and wears nothing more than his coat for protection. In an emergency the Tactician has a small blade which he can use with a modicum of skill.

While unskilled in the ways of personal combat, the Tactician knows much about the rhythm of war due to years of studying many tactical treatises. In his skilled hands even a rag tag group of farmers can be led to glory on the battlefield.

Always worried about the enemies' movement the Tactician spends every night studying and forcing his companions to do combat drills. When his companions aren't looking the Tactician prays to an old family heirloom to calm his nerves.
Grant an ally a bonus action
The answer must be in here somewhere!
On my mark, focus your attacks on it's weak spot.
You got blood on my coat.
Attack where your enemies are not prepared!
Tear down their flags and standards!
As long as we remember why we fight we cannot lose!
I'm getting quite good at this.
I can't die here, not like this...
Everything is going according to plan.
Come soldiers! there is work to be done!
If only the Emperor could see me now.
The path is clear! now, MARCH!
They are walking right into my trap...
I know exactly what they are planning!
I have already won this battle, Continue your assault, they will fall!
Everything is going according to plan!
Keep pushing, This battle can be won!
I'm planning to die in bed if you don't mind.
I need wine... WHERE IS MY WINE!?
The wine! they poisoned the wine!
There is a spy among us!
Why are you not folowing my orders?
We must move faster, they are folowing us!
I can see their scouts! We have been spotted!
I will pay for my families sins in blood!
Do I have to start whipping people?
Get in line or get out!
I will not allow you to drag me down to your level!
You are standing in my light.
Be quite! I know what I'm doing!
I have failed you as a leader....
All roads end the same way...
I can still see their faces... begging for help.
I'll never reclaim my family's honour.
I can't repend! I can see his flesh!
There must be a way out of here!
I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO!
The shadows! they hide in the shadows!
Stay away! go back to your positions!
I will lead the next assault, I have something to prove...
My pain will lead to redemption!
GET IN LINE! you left a hole in our formation!
Seems like I have to keep my orders simple...
I will not die because of your mistakes!
I have done so much, and for what?
We should flee before it's too late.
MEN'ALISH GRAK NI'KTOO SIRIUS. HOORVAN GRAK SNOOAVC!
MNAH GL'AK OBOOSHUU FTAGUH. HOM NGLUI.
The enemy! they are here to save me!
The blood... There is so much blood...
They will crush us, I'm getting ready to retreat.
2F, No no no, 12A! No that won't work!
Troops charge! NO WAIT, HOLD POSITIONS!
They are waiting to counter us, little do they know I have countered their counter!
Have you tried doing it yourself?
Where am I? where is my estate?
I am not falling for that.
Be quiet! I can't think with you fools screaming in my ears!
Make space! I shall take care of this.
You idiots! Why must I do everything myself?
I can do this myself thank you very much.
Make space! I shall take care of this.
I will take care of this myself!
Follow me! I found something to kill!
I can hear such beutifull singing...
Anyone want a drink? well too bad! I drank it all!
Did you drink all of my wine?
You stole my wine didn't you?
Stay back, give me some space!
I'm getting some more wine. and no, I'm not sharing.
Strike me down! I deserve it!
Yes! I shall be a beacon of faith!
Don't stand so close to me!
Yes holy flame! I will show them the way!
A sacrifice! the flame desires a sacrifice!
The bottle! I broke the wine bottle!
My old war wound is opening up again...
Blood for the blood god! YOG'HRANITH NELCHARIQ!
Running is what they want us to do!
It's too late... we are surrounded.
I can't leave now! not after everything I lost!
Do you not understand!? I have to do this!
We have not yet shown be truth of the flame to them!
They have broken through our lines!
I- I dodged to the left! How could it have known?!
You idiots caused this with your incompetence!
Kill me! I deserve to die like the rest of my family!
Yes! Punish me for my blasphemy!
There is a spy among us!
You actually hit something this time?
We could have ended this peacefully!
We will never pierce their armor!
Why are you ignoring my orders!?
You are trying to miss? are you not!?
let me give you a proper demonstration.
Did you not pray with me?
The gods want us to lay down our arms!
We are running out of soldiers!
That was an easy to block attack! why are you trying to get us all killed?
Does the pain help you forget too?
Why have you abondened me to this fate!?
That is exactly what they want me to do!
I won't fall for their traps!
This is where I should be.
This place is blessed by the gods!
It looks directly into my soul!
The enemy may have tampered with that!
No, I must do this myself!
Stay away! you are ruining everything!
No, I must do this myself...
Don't waste that, you may need it in the future.
NO! THAT WILL LEAD ME TO RUIN!
I did not order you to do that!
I will not let a potential spy touch me!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself...
Don't waste the effort on me.
No, I must do this myself...
I did not order you to do that!
I will not let a potential spy touch me!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself!
No, I must do this myself...
Please aid one of the troops, they deserve your help more than me.
I didn't know! I DIDN'T KNOW!
No... I deserve better than that...
Care for a game of chess?
I have brought my checkers board, care for a game?
You fight well, I shall give you an important place in the next formation.
Great, I'm covered in blood now...
Wounds like that are only lethal about 10% of the time in my experience.
Drink some of this wine, it will help take your mind of your pain.
Have you ever heard of Rithmomachy? I can teach the game to you if you wish.
Do you play chess? I can teach it to you.
I've brought some wine with me, I'll share some with you.
T-The troops need to keep their distance to their commander...
Why are there two of you..?
I will not let a potential spy touch me!
I won't fall for their traps!
I will not let you interfere!
I must pay for my apostasy alone!
I'm not letting a fool like you touch me.
Do I look like I'm stupid?
All I need is a good drink...
No... I didn't order you to do that!
I didn't order you to do that!
Do I look like I'm stupid?
I'm not letting a fool like you touch me.
And let you steal the glory? of course not!
All I need is a good drink... hic!
I think better on an empty stomach
All I need is my wine.
How ironic, The being that caused the fall of my family will also be my redeemer, I'm ready...

While unskilled in the ways of personal combat, the Tactician knows much about the rhythm of war due to years of studying many tactical treatises. In his skilled hands even a rag tag group of farmers can be led to glory on the battlefield.

Do I look like I'm stupid?
I'm not letting a fool like you touch me.
And let you steal the glory? of course not!
All I need is a good drink... hic!
I think better on an empty stomach
All I need is my wine.
How ironic, The being that caused the fall of my family will also be my redeemer, I'm ready...
The Tactician has a distaste for close combat and wears nothing more than his coat for protection. In an emergency the Tactician has a small blade which he can use with a modicum of skill.

While unskilled in the ways of personal combat, the Tactician knows much about the rhythm of war due to years of studying many tactical treatises. In his skilled hands even a rag tag group of farmers can be led to glory on the battlefield.

Always worried about the enemies' movement the Tactician spends every night studying and forcing his companions to do combat drills. When his companions aren't looking the Tactician prays to an old family heirloom to calm his nerves.
Grant an ally a bonus action
The answer must be in here somewhere!
On my mark, focus your attacks on it's weak spot.
You got blood on my coat.
Attack where your enemies are not prepared!
Tear down their flags and standards!
As long as we remember why we fight we cannot lose!
I'm getting quite good at this.
I can't die here, not like this...
Everything is going according to plan.
Come soldiers! there is work to be done!
If only the Emperor could see me now.
The path is clear! now, MARCH!
They are walking right into my trap...
I know exactly what they are planning!
I have already won this battle, Continue your assault, they will fall!
Everything is going according to plan!
Keep pushing, This battle can be won!
I'm planning to die in bed if you don't mind.
I need wine... WHERE IS MY WINE!?
The wine! they poisoned the wine!
There is a spy among us!
Why are you not folowing my orders?
We must move faster, they are folowing us!
I can see their scouts! We have been spotted!
I will pay for my families sins in blood!
Do I have to start whipping people?
Get in line or get out!
I will not allow you to drag me down to your level!
You are standing in my light.
Be quite! I know what I'm doing!
I have failed you as a leader....
All roads end the same way...
I can still see their faces... begging for help.
I'll never reclaim my family's honour.
I can't repend! I can see his flesh!
There must be a way out of here!
I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO!
The shadows! they hide in the shadows!
Stay away! go back to your positions!
I will lead the next assault, I have something to prove...
My pain will lead to redemption!
GET IN LINE! you left a hole in our formation!
Seems like I have to keep my orders simple...
I will not die because of your mistakes!
I have done so much, and for what?
We should flee before it's too late.
MEN'ALISH GRAK NI'KTOO SIRIUS. HOORVAN GRAK SNOOAVC!
MNAH GL'AK OBOOSHUU FTAGUH. HOM NGLUI.
The enemy! they are here to save me!
The blood... There is so much blood...
They will crush us, I'm getting ready to retreat.
2F, No no no, 12A! No that won't work!
Troops charge! NO WAIT, HOLD POSITIONS!
They are waiting to counter us, little do they know I have countered their counter!
Have you tried doing it yourself?
Where am I? where is my estate?
I am not falling for that.
Be quiet! I can't think with you fools screaming in my ears!
Make space! I shall take care of this.
You idiots! Why must I do everything myself?
I can do this myself thank you very much.
Make space! I shall take care of this.
I will take care of this myself!
Follow me! I found something to kill!
I can hear such beutifull singing...
Anyone want a drink? well too bad! I drank it all!
Did you drink all of my wine?
You stole my wine didn't you?
Stay back, give me some space!
I'm getting some more wine. and no, I'm not sharing.
Strike me down! I deserve it!
Yes! I shall be a beacon of faith!
Don't stand so close to me!
Yes holy flame! I will show them the way!
A sacrifice! the flame desires a sacrifice!
The bottle! I broke the wine bottle!
My old war wound is opening up again...
Blood for the blood god! YOG'HRANITH NELCHARIQ!
Running is what they want us to do!
It's too late... we are surrounded.
I can't leave now! not after everything I lost!
Do you not understand!? I have to do this!
We have not yet shown be truth of the flame to them!
They have broken through our lines!
I- I dodged to the left! How could it have known?!
You idiots caused this with your incompetence!
Kill me! I deserve to die like the rest of my family!
Yes! Punish me for my blasphemy!
There is a spy among us!
You actually hit something this time?
We could have ended this peacefully!
We will never pierce their armor!
Why are you ignoring my orders!?
You are trying to miss? are you not!?
let me give you a proper demonstration.
Did you not pray with me?
The gods want us to lay down our arms!
We are running out of soldiers!
That was an easy to block attack! why are you trying to get us all killed?
Does the pain help you forget too?
Why have you abondened me to this fate!?
That is exactly what they want me to do!
I won't fall for their traps!
This is where I should be.
This place is blessed by the gods!
It looks directly into my soul!
The enemy may have tampered with that!
No, I must do this myself!
Stay away! you are ruining everything!
No, I must do this myself...
Don't waste that, you may need it in the future.
NO! THAT WILL LEAD ME TO RUIN!
I did not order you to do that!
I will not let a potential spy touch me!

Why are there two of you..?
I will not let a potential spy touch me!
I won't fall for their traps!
I will not let you interfere!
I must pay for my apostasy alone!
I'm not letting a fool like you touch me.
Do I look like I'm stupid?
All I need is a good drink...
No... I didn't order you to do that!
I didn't order you to do that!
Do I look like I'm stupid?
I'm not letting a fool like you touch me.
And let you steal the glory? of course not!
All I need is a good drink... hic!
I think better on an empty stomach
All I need is my wine.
How ironic, The being that caused the fall of my family will also be my redeemer, I'm ready...
The Tactician has a distaste for close combat and wears nothing more than his coat for protection. In an emergency the Tactician has a small blade which he can use with a modicum of skill.

While unskilled in the ways of personal combat, the Tactician knows much about the rhythm of war due to years of studying many tactical treatises. In his skilled hands even a rag tag group of farmers can be led to glory on the battlefield.

Always worried about the enemies' movement the Tactician spends every night studying and forcing his companions to do combat drills. When his companions aren't looking the Tactician prays to an old family heirloom to calm his nerves.
Grant an ally a bonus action
The answer must be in here somewhere!
On my mark, focus your attacks on it's weak spot.
You got blood on my coat.
Attack where your enemies are not prepared!
Tear down their flags and standards!
As long as we remember why we fight we cannot lose!
I'm getting quite good at this.
I can't die here, not like this...
Everything is going according to plan.
Come soldiers! there is work to be done!
If only the Emperor could see me now.
The path is clear! now, MARCH!
They are walking right into my trap...
I know exactly what they are planning!
I have already won this battle, Continue your assault, they will fall!
Everything is going according to plan!
Keep pushing, This battle can be won!
I'm planning to die in bed if you don't mind.
I need wine... WHERE IS MY WINE!?
The wine! they poisoned the wine!
There is a spy among us!
Why are you not folowing my orders?
We must move faster, they are folowing us!
I can see their scouts! We have been spotted!
I will pay for my families sins in blood!
Do I have to start whipping people?
Get in line or get out!
I will not allow you to drag me down to your level!
You are standing in my light.
Be quite! I know what I'm doing!
I have failed you as a leader....
All roads end the same way...
I can still see their faces... begging for help.
I'll never reclaim my family's honour.
I can't repend! I can see his flesh!
There must be a way out of here!
I DON'T KNOW WHAT TO DO!
The shadows! they hide in the shadows!
Stay away! go back to your positions!
I will lead the next assault, I have something to prove...
My pain will lead to redemption!
GET IN LINE! you left a hole in our formation!
Seems like I have to keep my orders simple...
I will not die because of your mistakes!
I have done so much, and for what?
We should flee before it's too late.
MEN'ALISH GRAK NI'KTOO SIRIUS. HOORVAN GRAK SNOOAVC!
MNAH GL'AK OBOOSHUU FTAGUH. HOM NGLUI.
The enemy! they are here to save me!
The blood... There is so much blood...
They will crush us, I'm getting ready to retreat.
2F, No no no, 12A! No that won't work!
Troops charge! NO WAIT, HOLD POSITIONS!
They are waiting to counter us, little do they know I have countered their counter!
Have you tried doing it yourself?
Where am I? where is my estate?
I am not falling for that.
Be quiet! I can't think with you fools screaming in my ears!
Make space! I shall take care of this.
You idiots! Why must I do everything myself?
I can do this myself thank you very much.
Make space! I shall take care of this.
I will take care of this myself!
Follow me! I found something to kill!
I can hear such beutifull singing...
Anyone want a drink? well too bad! I drank it all!
Did you drink all of my wine?
You stole my wine didn't you?
Stay back, give me some space!
I'm getting some more wine. and no, I'm not sharing.
Strike me down! I deserve it!
Yes! I shall be a beacon of faith!
Don't stand so close to me!
Yes holy flame! I will show them the way!
A sacrifice! the flame desires a sacrifice!
The bottle! I broke the wine bottle!
My old war wound is opening up again...
Blood for the blood god! YOG'HRANITH NELCHARIQ!
Running is what they want us to do!
It's too late... we are surrounded.
I can't leave now! not after everything I lost!
Do you not understand!? I have to do this!
We have not yet shown be truth of the flame to them!
They have broken through our lines!
I- I dodged to the left! How could it have known?!
You idiots caused this with your incompetence!
Kill me! I deserve to die like the rest of my family!
Yes! Punish me for my blasphemy!
There is a spy among us!
You actually hit something this time?
We could have ended this peacefully!
We will never pierce their armor!
Why are you ignoring my orders!?
You are trying to miss? are you not!?
let me give you a proper demonstration.
Did you not pray with me?
The gods want us to lay down our arms!
We are running out of soldiers!
That was an easy to block attack! why are you trying to get us all killed?
Does the pain help you forget too?
Why have you abondened me to this fate!?
That is exactly what they want me to do!
I won't fall for their traps!
This is where I should be.
This place is blessed by the gods!
It looks directly into my soul!
The enemy may have tampered with that!
No, I must do this myself!
Stay away! you are ruining everything!
No, I must do this myself...
Don't waste that, you may need it in the future.
NO! THAT WILL LEAD ME TO RUIN!
I did not order you to do that!

No... I deserve better than that...
Care for a game of chess?
I have brought my checkers board, care for a game?
You fight well, I shall give you an important place in the next formation.
Great, I'm covered in blood now...
Wounds like that are only lethal about 10% of the time in my experience.
Drink some of this wine, it will help take your mind of your pain.
Have you ever heard of Rithmomachy? I can teach the game to you if you wish.
Do you play chess? I can teach it to you.
I've brought some wine with me, I'll share some with you.
